com.bindroid.converters
Class BoolConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.bindroid.ValueConverter
      com.bindroid.converters.BoolConverter

public class BoolConverter
extends ValueConverter

A ValueConverter for converting to boolean values or visibilities in BindingMode.ONE_WAY bindings.

Method Detail

get

public static ValueConverter get()
Returns:
A BoolConverter that treats null, 0, and false as false, while everything else is considered true.

get

public static ValueConverter get(boolean invert)
Gets a standard BoolConverter, optionally inverting the values it returns.

Parameters:
invert - Whether to invert the standard truthiness of the values.
Returns:
A BoolConverter properly configured.

get

public static ValueConverter get(boolean invert,
                                 boolean zeroLengthListIsFalse)
Gets a standard BoolConverter, optionally inverting the values it returns, and optionally considering a zero-length list to be a falsey value.

Parameters:
invert - Whether to invert the standard truthiness of the values.
zeroLengthListIsFalse - Whether a zero-length list should be considered falsey.
Returns:
A BoolConverter properly configured.

convertToSource

public java.lang.Object convertToSource(java.lang.Object targetValue,
                                        java.lang.Class<?> sourceType)
Description copied from class: ValueConverter
Converts a target value into a source value. This is called whenever the target property's value is being applied to the source property in a BindingMode.ONE_WAY_TO_SOURCE or BindingMode.TWO_WAY Binding.

Overrides:
convertToSource in class ValueConverter
Parameters:
targetValue - The value of the target property.
sourceType - The type of the source property.
Returns:
The value to apply to the target.

convertToTarget

public java.lang.Object convertToTarget(java.lang.Object sourceValue,
                                        java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
Description copied from class: ValueConverter
Converts a source value into a target value. This is called whenever the source property's value is being applied to the target property in a BindingMode.ONE_WAY or BindingMode.TWO_WAY Binding.

Overrides:
convertToTarget in class ValueConverter
Returns:
The value to apply to the target.
